name: Tetraphobia Portal Generator
description:
A small demo scene I made to show off the portal generator I used to randomly generate the island portal connectors. This helps adds a bit of variety to the same portals used in the game. Also adds a good level of customisation so I can create portals specific to certain islands (boss rooms) by just changing the objects it generates with. 

If you want to check out more of the game you can see development on my website www.tetraphobia.net

Have fun generating some unique portals in a stylised environment :) 

Share your creations with me on twitter and instagram! #tetraphobia

https://twitter.com/TetraphobiaGame
https://www.instagram.com/tetraphobiagam
